body:
New Loki is alive theory

This was posted by a user on reddit

Loki is right handed, if you look in movies since Thor 1, to Avengers to Ragnarok, he wields with his right hand. He holds weapons with his right hand and the sceptor in Avengers with his right. There are 2 occasions where his uses his left hand (that i’ve found). One when he fakes his own death in Dark world. You can find him holding the dagger with his left hand during the entire scene. Two when he stabs Thanos.

So, Loki’s illusion uses his left hand because he’s a mirrored version? The Loki that was killed in the beginning of IW is an illusion and he’s still out there, maybe disguised or just in hiding…

title: apparition
body:
“that pretty little thing could shatter your skull with her voice if someone decided to teach her how.”

prologue

She is only seven and yet her world comes crashing down at what she’s seen.From those youthful eyes, she’s watched conflicts arise and fade within the very confinements of the house she lived in. How…

Read more…

summary: This is war [Bucky Barnes x Reader]
title: This is war [Bucky Barnes x Reader]
body:
Pairing: Bucky x Reader

Warnings: Probably bad words, ladies. That’s about it.

Request (By m-a-t-91): Hi could you do a request with Bucky x Reader like bucky likes her but Quill comes along and quill is super flirty with her n makes Barnes jealous anyways they constantly try to get her attention etc she ends up with Buck please if possible😊

A/N: y’all i’m freaking excited about this so i really hope you like it, and thank u so much baby for being the first one! i hope u love it as much as i do.

One thing is sure: Peter Quill is a complete douchebag. He farts, he burps, he tells the most terrible jokes ever, he doesn’t know how to cook a pizza properly and he has the worst pick up lines on the galaxy.

The most best thing about him? His unique sense of humor.

“Oh I’m telling you Y/N, I beat his ass as a giant pacman!” Peter yelled at you while he laughed like an idiot holding onto his belly, you laughed instantly.

“You’re so full of shit!”

“Baby, I’m not!” He couldn’t stop laughing just like you. There’s something about his voice that isn’t right, there’s something about him that makes you laugh in he moment you hear something coming out of his mout. It’s like a click! inside your head: As soon as you hear his voice you start laughing out of nowhere. “He was like this huge man made of rocks, you know? It was pretty… pretty awesome…” He whispered the last words while his smile fade away, realization hitting you on the face almost immediately.

“Hey, King Q,” you tried the silly name you made up for him months ago while both of you played jenga, “you alright there?”

Peter remained silent. You knew he wasn’t alright at all and that hurted you. Ever since the Guardians –with Peter included– fought and defetead Ego, Peter’s been acting really weird, but he refused to talk about it… or about Ego himself. “I could really use a hug.” A teasing smile covered his face and you threw yourself right into his chest, squeezing him strongly. “That’s better, baby.” He murmured in your hear.

“Am I interrumpint something?” A manly voice said over your chuckles and Peter’s soft words against your ear.

“Yes.”

“No.” Both of you said at the same time. You pinched Peter’s ribs with your elbow and then you smiled at the beautiful ex-assassin a few meters away from you. “Is everything okay?”

“The rabbit is calling for you, Quill.” Bucky said firmly while tensing his robotic arm.

“Raccon, little soldier, raccon. Maybe you shouldn’t say that in front of Rocket, you know? He might cut that arm of yours while you sleep, Sleeping Beauty.”

“Peter.”

“Yeah, yeah, babe, I know.” Quill said with a hand gesture and then he turned over his heels to face you. “To be continued, baby. Feeling like karaoke tonight?”

“Y/N and I have work to do, Quill. Unlike you, some of us have some responsabilities in here.”

Peter rolled his eyes to the sky and he gave a mischievously smile to you. “So? Karaoke? I’m sure Groot would love some karaoke battles with the two of us.”

“Sorry, King Q, but as the soldier said I have work to do. But we’ll do it soon! Groot included!” You cheered him up and then you kissed his cheek, Peter grunted at Bucky on his way out and he whispered: This is war, smartass.

The Winter Soldier stood still while he watched the light brown haired man get out of the room that him and you were right now. He couldn’t believe you actually spent your time with that guy. He couldn’t understand why you liked him on the first place.

Bucky doesn’t feel too many things, not like other people do. He wish he could feel empathy for someone other than Steve and you, he really tries to build conversations with other people inside the Avengers and the Guardians but it’s way too difficult for him to do so when every and last one of them still doubts of the kind of person he is.

It’s difficult when people judge you, even if they have the right motives to do so.

“So,” you said, “wanna do something fun after we do the job? Or you’re too busy to have fun, Winter Soldier?”

The blue eyed men breathed slowly while he placed his gaze on you. He felt tickles on his chest and his hearbeat razed right on time. Bucky hates when people calls him that, but when whose words came out of your mouth… he couldn’t feel anything but joy. “I’m an assasian.”

“You were an assasin.” You corrected his words, wishing you could erase all the bad things and thoughts out of his mind. “Can I ask you something, Buck?”

“Hhm-hm.”

“Do you think Quill and I would make a good couple?”

“What?” His voice came harsher than he wish. You raised one of your eyebrows when you heard his words came out in such a shock.

“Yeah, you know… couple. A girl and boy like each other, they make each other laugh, they start kissing each other–”

“Quill kissed you?” Bucky asked with a desperate tone while feeling his heart broke with the look you gave him.

Hurting him was the last thing you wanted to do, but lying to him was the best you could think for him to tell you the truth: You wanted to now right now if Bucky liked you or not. You’ve been getting a lot of strange looks from him, and maybe a couple of jealous scenes when it came to Peter and you, you wanted to know if the soldier had some kind of feeling for you because you surely have real feelings for him. “Maybe.”

“Maybe? What’s that supposed to mean?” He aproached to you invading your personal space, but you didn’t mind it. The heat of his own warm body was flowing to yours and it felt amazing. “I can’t believe it… son of a bitch.”

Your moth opened when your heard the insults come out of his polite mouth. “I knew it.” You said, pointing with your index finger. “You’re jealous!”

“What? No, I’m not… I’m not. Why would I be jealous?” He asked while walking all the steps back. “Y/N… it’s just… Quill is not a good guy.”

“He’s not a bad guy either, Buck, he’s been through a lot of things and he acts like nothing hurts, that’s all.”

“Like a jerk.”

“Yeah, sometimes… but he’s hurting just like you. Shit, I’m missing the point here,” you said and laughed at your silliness, “I… I really like you, Buck, and I think you like me too… and I just wanted to let you know that. You’re special… special to me and I don’t wanna lose you, you know?”

“Y/N…”

“I know it’s not easy,” you raised both hands in a signal for him to stop talking, “but I already tried pretending like I didin’t feel anything and I didn’t work. Peter and I… we’re good partners, we work together and we’re good at it but that’s it.”

“You shouldn’t feel things for me.” He said while shaking his head from side to side. “Y/N I’m not good at these things. I’m not romantic, I’m not cocky enought like Quill and I… I can’t even trust myself.”

“We can work on that.” You comforted him with sweet words, you placed your hand on his cheek and he closed his eyes, enjoying the touch of your hand. “We’ve lost so much already… I can’t afford to lose you too, Barnes.”

Bucky’s fortress crumbled in the exact moment he met his eyes with yours, he couldn’t resist his feelings for you anymore, he couldn’t fight them, he didn’t want to. He just wanted to feel something… something real for someone, and that someone was you. “I don’t like Quill.” He said with a rusky voice and then he grabbed you by the hips.

“I love Peter.” You teased him.

“You’re gonna love me.”

“I already love you, Bucky.”

reblog.comment:
Pairing: Bucky x Reader

Warnings: Probably bad words, ladies. That’s about it.

It’s difficult when people judge you, even if they have the right motives to do so.

“So,” you said, “wanna do something fun after we do the job? Or you’re too busy to have fun, Winter Soldier?”

The blue eyed men breathed slowly while he placed his gaze on you. He felt tickles on his chest and his hearbeat razed right on time. Bucky hates when people calls him that, but when whose words came out of your mouth… he couldn’t feel anything but joy. “I’m an assasian.”

“You were an assasin.” You corrected his words, wishing you could erase all the bad things and thoughts out of his mind. “Can I ask you something, Buck?”

“Hhm-hm.”

“Do you think Quill and I would make a good couple?”

“What?” His voice came harsher than he wish. You raised one of your eyebrows when you heard his words came out in such a shock.

“Yeah, you know… couple. A girl and boy like each other, they make each other laugh, they start kissing each other–”

“Quill kissed you?” Bucky asked with a desperate tone while feeling his heart broke with the look you gave him.

Hurting him was the last thing you wanted to do, but lying to him was the best you could think for him to tell you the truth: You wanted to now right now if Bucky liked you or not. You’ve been getting a lot of strange looks from him, and maybe a couple of jealous scenes when it came to Peter and you, you wanted to know if the soldier had some kind of feeling for you because you surely have real feelings for him. “Maybe.”

“Maybe? What’s that supposed to mean?” He aproached to you invading your personal space, but you didn’t mind it. The heat of his own warm body was flowing to yours and it felt amazing. “I can’t believe it… son of a bitch.”

Your moth opened when your heard the insults come out of his polite mouth. “I knew it.” You said, pointing with your index finger. “You’re jealous!”

“What? No, I’m not… I’m not. Why would I be jealous?” He asked while walking all the steps back. “Y/N… it’s just… Quill is not a good guy.”

“He’s not a bad guy either, Buck, he’s been through a lot of things and he acts like nothing hurts, that’s all.”

“Like a jerk.”

“Yeah, sometimes… but he’s hurting just like you. Shit, I’m missing the point here,” you said and laughed at your silliness, “I… I really like you, Buck, and I think you like me too… and I just wanted to let you know that. You’re special… special to me and I don’t wanna lose you, you know?”

“Y/N…”

“I know it’s not easy,” you raised both hands in a signal for him to stop talking, “but I already tried pretending like I didin’t feel anything and I didn’t work. Peter and I… we’re good partners, we work together and we’re good at it but that’s it.”

“You shouldn’t feel things for me.” He said while shaking his head from side to side. “Y/N I’m not good at these things. I’m not romantic, I’m not cocky enought like Quill and I… I can’t even trust myself.”

“We can work on that.” You comforted him with sweet words, you placed your hand on his cheek and he closed his eyes, enjoying the touch of your hand. “We’ve lost so much already… I can’t afford to lose you too, Barnes.”

Bucky’s fortress crumbled in the exact moment he met his eyes with yours, he couldn’t resist his feelings for you anymore, he couldn’t fight them, he didn’t want to. He just wanted to feel something… something real for someone, and that someone was you. “I don’t like Quill.” He said with a rusky voice and then he grabbed you by the hips.

“I love Peter.” You teased him.

“You’re gonna love me.”

“I already love you, Bucky.”
trail.content:
Pairing: Bucky x Reader

Warnings: Probably bad words, ladies. That’s about it.

Request (By m-a-t-91): Hi could you do a request with Bucky x Reader like bucky likes her but Quill comes along and quill is super flirty with her n makes Barnes jealous anyways they constantly try to get her attention etc she ends up with Buck please if possible😊

A/N: y’all i’m freaking excited about this so i really hope you like it, and thank u so much baby for being the first one! i hope u love it as much as i do.

One thing is sure: Peter Quill is a complete douchebag. He farts, he burps, he tells the most terrible jokes ever, he doesn’t know how to cook a pizza properly and he has the worst pick up lines on the galaxy.

The most best thing about him? His unique sense of humor.

“Oh I’m telling you Y/N, I beat his ass as a giant pacman!” Peter yelled at you while he laughed like an idiot holding onto his belly, you laughed instantly.

“You’re so full of shit!”

“Baby, I’m not!” He couldn’t stop laughing just like you. There’s something about his voice that isn’t right, there’s something about him that makes you laugh in he moment you hear something coming out of his mout. It’s like a click! inside your head: As soon as you hear his voice you start laughing out of nowhere. “He was like this huge man made of rocks, you know? It was pretty… pretty awesome…” He whispered the last words while his smile fade away, realization hitting you on the face almost immediately.

“Hey, King Q,” you tried the silly name you made up for him months ago while both of you played jenga, “you alright there?”

Peter remained silent. You knew he wasn’t alright at all and that hurted you. Ever since the Guardians –with Peter included– fought and defetead Ego, Peter’s been acting really weird, but he refused to talk about it… or about Ego himself. “I could really use a hug.” A teasing smile covered his face and you threw yourself right into his chest, squeezing him strongly. “That’s better, baby.” He murmured in your hear.

“Am I interrumpint something?” A manly voice said over your chuckles and Peter’s soft words against your ear.

“Yes.”

“No.” Both of you said at the same time. You pinched Peter’s ribs with your elbow and then you smiled at the beautiful ex-assassin a few meters away from you. “Is everything okay?”

“The rabbit is calling for you, Quill.” Bucky said firmly while tensing his robotic arm.

“Raccon, little soldier, raccon. Maybe you shouldn’t say that in front of Rocket, you know? He might cut that arm of yours while you sleep, Sleeping Beauty.”

“Peter.”

“Yeah, yeah, babe, I know.” Quill said with a hand gesture and then he turned over his heels to face you. “To be continued, baby. Feeling like karaoke tonight?”

“Y/N and I have work to do, Quill. Unlike you, some of us have some responsabilities in here.”

Peter rolled his eyes to the sky and he gave a mischievously smile to you. “So? Karaoke? I’m sure Groot would love some karaoke battles with the two of us.”

“Sorry, King Q, but as the soldier said I have work to do. But we’ll do it soon! Groot included!” You cheered him up and then you kissed his cheek, Peter grunted at Bucky on his way out and he whispered: This is war, smartass.

The Winter Soldier stood still while he watched the light brown haired man get out of the room that him and you were right now. He couldn’t believe you actually spent your time with that guy. He couldn’t understand why you liked him on the first place.

Bucky doesn’t feel too many things, not like other people do. He wish he could feel empathy for someone other than Steve and you, he really tries to build conversations with other people inside the Avengers and the Guardians but it’s way too difficult for him to do so when every and last one of them still doubts of the kind of person he is.

It’s difficult when people judge you, even if they have the right motives to do so.

“So,” you said, “wanna do something fun after we do the job? Or you’re too busy to have fun, Winter Soldier?”

The blue eyed men breathed slowly while he placed his gaze on you. He felt tickles on his chest and his hearbeat razed right on time. Bucky hates when people calls him that, but when whose words came out of your mouth… he couldn’t feel anything but joy. “I’m an assasian.”

“You were an assasin.” You corrected his words, wishing you could erase all the bad things and thoughts out of his mind. “Can I ask you something, Buck?”

“Hhm-hm.”

“Do you think Quill and I would make a good couple?”

“What?” His voice came harsher than he wish. You raised one of your eyebrows when you heard his words came out in such a shock.

“Yeah, you know… couple. A girl and boy like each other, they make each other laugh, they start kissing each other–”

“Quill kissed you?” Bucky asked with a desperate tone while feeling his heart broke with the look you gave him.

Hurting him was the last thing you wanted to do, but lying to him was the best you could think for him to tell you the truth: You wanted to now right now if Bucky liked you or not. You’ve been getting a lot of strange looks from him, and maybe a couple of jealous scenes when it came to Peter and you, you wanted to know if the soldier had some kind of feeling for you because you surely have real feelings for him. “Maybe.”

“Maybe? What’s that supposed to mean?” He aproached to you invading your personal space, but you didn’t mind it. The heat of his own warm body was flowing to yours and it felt amazing. “I can’t believe it… son of a bitch.”

Your moth opened when your heard the insults come out of his polite mouth. “I knew it.” You said, pointing with your index finger. “You’re jealous!”

“What? No, I’m not… I’m not. Why would I be jealous?” He asked while walking all the steps back. “Y/N… it’s just… Quill is not a good guy.”

“He’s not a bad guy either, Buck, he’s been through a lot of things and he acts like nothing hurts, that’s all.”

“Like a jerk.”

“Yeah, sometimes… but he’s hurting just like you. Shit, I’m missing the point here,” you said and laughed at your silliness, “I… I really like you, Buck, and I think you like me too… and I just wanted to let you know that. You’re special… special to me and I don’t wanna lose you, you know?”

“Y/N…”

“I know it’s not easy,” you raised both hands in a signal for him to stop talking, “but I already tried pretending like I didin’t feel anything and I didn’t work. Peter and I… we’re good partners, we work together and we’re good at it but that’s it.”

“You shouldn’t feel things for me.” He said while shaking his head from side to side. “Y/N I’m not good at these things. I’m not romantic, I’m not cocky enought like Quill and I… I can’t even trust myself.”

“We can work on that.” You comforted him with sweet words, you placed your hand on his cheek and he closed his eyes, enjoying the touch of your hand. “We’ve lost so much already… I can’t afford to lose you too, Barnes.”

Bucky’s fortress crumbled in the exact moment he met his eyes with yours, he couldn’t resist his feelings for you anymore, he couldn’t fight them, he didn’t want to. He just wanted to feel something… something real for someone, and that someone was you. “I don’t like Quill.” He said with a rusky voice and then he grabbed you by the hips.

“I love Peter.” You teased him.

“You’re gonna love me.”

“I already love you, Bucky.”

blog.name: que3nr1ot
blog.title: Brain Dump
blog.description:
Age: Don't ask! Just know I'm more than legal.||
Pronouns: She/Her||
I like to put down whatever comes to mind.

body:
Hawkeye or IronHawk headcanon

However you choose to look at it.

Clint hates silence. He hates the dead silence and being stuck with only his thoughts for company. He will always try to fill the space with mindless chatter and annoying sounds just to avoid his thoughts.

(Unless it is absolutely necessary he tries to avoid the endless vacuum that is silence.)

Because he grew up in a circus he was always surrounded by noise, even during the sleeping hours. When he lost his hearing he did not take that so well. So when his hearing aids do on the fritz evey now and again he will crawl into the vents and post himself over Tony’s workshop just to feel the booming bass of his loud music until something can be done. (He knows it’s not the same as actually hearing but it calms him enough to keep the dark thoughts away.)

Tony finds out about this and he creates specially made hearing aids that allow Clint to not just turn them on and off but also allow them to act act earphones without the unnecessary feedback. Clint can switch the functions manually or use the remote located around his wrist so he can listen in on SHIELD briefings or relax to a radio station or audio book. They even have the function to filter out sounds in case there is too much of it around him and he cannot concentrate.

The first time he ever willingly went without noise outside of missions was when he was in Tony’s workshop. Tony was explaining something complicated that had nothing to do with the arrows he came to collect. Tony was only five minutes into his presentation when Clint discretely shuts off his aids and just watches as Tony goes on and on adamantly while he just nods every now and then, amused by how animated the genius is.

Tony of course catches the movement one day and instead of continuing with his presentation will instead tell a joke or ridiculous story while Clint nods along. (Clint can read lips but chooses not to seeing as Tony likes to use long and complicated words and tends not to look at him when talking.)

One day Clint is nodding along to Tony when he catches what looked like the word ‘sheikh’ coming from his lips. Confused, he turns his aids back to to catch the tail end of the joke.

“-o he goes up to the last guy and asks what he does for a living and the man replies 'I’m a lollipop salesman.’”

“What the hell?” He asked, not sure what he tuned back in to.

Tony turns around with a sly grin and proudly says “welcome back, looks like you caught the end of the joke. I thought you didn’t like the silence.” He accused.

Squirming around a bit Clint looks at him as he admits, “I’m don’t, but when I’m with you I feel like you’re loud enough for the both of us. And one day I just turned them off and watched you move around. When did you find out?”

“Around the third time it happened. I called out to you and you kept on nodding away.”

“Do you always tell - what was that, a dirty joke?”

Tony waves a hand at him. “Nah, sometimes it’s me talking about my day, mathematical equations, or the occasional movie quote. Last time I sang No Good Deeds from the "Wicked” musical.

Clint stared at the man as he just smiled and went back to his contraption.

Not even mad about it, Clint continued to turn his aids off around Tony just to see what will happen and Tony continued to mess with him by telling a dirty joke, saying the most random things, or even going so far as to speak another language just to gauge if Clint is listening or not.

Someone on Tumblr asked for IronHawk headcanons and this one just popped into my head as I was thinking back on it.
